name.jp: ビレリアンの黄金ヘルメット
name.vi: Mũ bảo hiểm vàng của Billaon

description.en: A beautiful golden helmet that the Knight Hero used during the war.
description.ar: A beautiful golden helmet that the Knight Hero used during the war.
description.br: Um lindo Elmo dourado utilizado pelo Herói Knight durante a guerra.
description.cns: 骑士英雄毕雷恩在英雄战争时装戴过的黄金帽
description.de: (Jobquestitem) Der wunderschöne goldene Helm, den der Knight Hero Billaon im Krieg getragen hat.
description.fi: A beautiful golden helmet that the Knight Hero used during the war.
description.fil: A beautiful golden helmet that the Knight Hero used during the war.
description.fr: magnifique casque en or porté pendant la Grande Guerre par Billein, le Héros des Chevaliers.
description.id: Helm emas cantik yang digunakan Knight Hero selama perang.
description.it: A beautiful golden helmet that the Knight Hero used during the war.
description.jp: ナイト英雄ビレリアンが英雄戦争でかぶっていた黄金のヘルメット。ハイドワーフの複雑な細工が施されている。「ビレリアンの兜が戦場にきらめく時、英雄達はときの声をあげ、敵は恐怖に震えた」
description.kr: 나이트 영웅 빌레이언이 영웅전쟁 당시 사용하던 헬멧으로 화려한 황금 투구.
description.nl: A beautiful golden helmet that the Knight Hero used during the war.
description.pl: A beautiful golden helmet that the Knight Hero used during the war.
description.sp: Un hermoso casco dorado que el Héroe Knight usó durante la guerra.
description.sw: A beautiful golden helmet that the Knight Hero used during the war.
description.th: หมวกทองคำสวยงามที่อัศวินฮีโร่ใช้ในสงคราม
description.tw: 騎士英雄畢雷恩在英雄戰爭時裝戴過的黃金帽
description.vi: Một chiếc mũ bảo hiểm vàng tuyệt đẹp mà Anh hùng Hiệp sĩ đã sử dụng trong chiến tranh.
